build_instruction: Build features within each milestone sequentially. Client-side and Internal-side features within the same milestone can be built in parallel as they represent different user interfaces and access roles.

milestones.name: Foundation & Intake Live
milestones.description: Establish user access, foundational roles, and the complete ability to receive and triage all client service requests.

client_side.description: Client registration with email and phone number.
Email OTP verification flow for new client accounts.
Submit form for Consultation request (category-based).
Submit form for Idea Generation request.
Book preliminary meeting time (for Research/IP/Copyright models).
Digitally Sign the required NDA and SLA documents (Non-MVP E-Sign Integration required).

internal_side.description: Manager's centralized review queue for all new service requests.
Employee action to send a direct Meeting Invitation (Model 3 flow).
Employee review and confirmation of client-booked calendar slots.
Automatic triage/filtering logic to route requests to the most appropriate employee.
Manager view for the status of client NDA and SLA signings (Non-MVP E-Sign Integration required).

milestones.name: Execution Core Complete
milestones.description: Deploy tools for internal execution, implement collaboration, and launch read-only transparency for the client.

client_side.description: Client Dashboard overview (summary of all projects).
Client view of current and historical request/project statuses.
Client read-only view of Project Scope, Timeline, Milestones, and Completion Percentage.
Client view of the next scheduled meeting details.
Client submission of a formal scope change request.
Client ability to add comments to a project or milestone thread.
Client view of current and pending quotes/agreements status.
Client access to view NDA/SLA documents.
Client participation in comment-based negotiation for Idea track (Non-MVP, depends on T-10).

internal_side.description: Team Member view of all assigned tasks across all projects.
Team Member CRUD for granular internal Tasks.
Team Member ability to comment on any milestone or task.
Manager approval/rejection of client-submitted Scope Change Requests.
Manager ability to log new project-related purchases or expenses.
Project Manager view of their assigned project's internal data (Tasks, Expenses, Team).
Project Manager ability to add/remove Employee Tasks on their projects.
Manager view of the negotiation history thread (comments) for Idea track requests (Non-MVP, UI required).

milestones.name: Quotation Gate Ready
milestones.description: Implement the financial tools and formal actions required to close the sale and move requests into active projects.

client_side.description: Client form to rate the experience and provide feedback on project closure.
Client action to accept or reject a Formal Quote/Agreement (Non-MVP E-Sign/Contract logic required).
Client upload of a payment confirmation file (Non-MVP file handling required).
Client ability to recharge their token wallet balance (Non-MVP Payment/Wallet required).
Client access to the AI Assessment module using tokens (Non-MVP AI integration required).

internal_side.description: Employee/Manager access to the **Unified Metrics & Quotation Tool** calculation engine.
Manager action to formally **Approve or Reject a new Service Request** (pipeline gate).
Manager action to assign the core team (Employees, PMs) to the approved project.
Manager ability to issue a formal Quote or Agreement document to the client (Non-MVP Contract generation required).
Manager controls for the client's token wallet (recharge/view balance/refund) (Non-MVP Wallet system required).
Manager verification and approval of the client's payment confirmation file (Non-MVP file handling required).
